title: Adeel Mangi would be the first Muslim American federal appellate judge. But first, he has to get past a smear campaign.
description: A right-wing attack on a nominee to become the first Muslim-American federal judge has caused even some Democrats to wobble.
snippet: President Joe Biden has nominated Adeel Mangi to the 3rd U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals, in the latest example of his effort to diversify the federal judiciary. ...
